messages.message:
Hey @mfichman, I see that you merged a PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/64028) yesterday which removes the setup ssl step from `workspace setup` but my sandbox (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/prakhar-sb?cw=dev) is constantly failing today on the setup ssl step with the error
```2024-10-22T12:30:41Z    INFO    Setting up SSL
/bin/sh: 0: cannot open /home/owner/instabase/tools/devtools/ssl/setup_ssl.sh: No such file

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
| End of Output
=============================================/bin/sh: 0: cannot open /home/owner/instabase/tools/devtools/ssl/setup_ssl.sh: No such file

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
| End of Output
===========================================================================```
Do I need to change something to make this work?
Yes -- please update your sandbox, and check the "refresh image option." Screenshot to follow:
Will this remove my local data?
If you have data outside of $HOME, then yes.
That should be fine then. Thanks!
